hanzi-su-wiki:
像

Значения

Подделывать; быть похожим, копировать, портрет

Мнемоника

Элементы человек 亻 и слон 象 в написании содержат мало абстракции и похожи на объект изображения.
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiàng
to resemble; to be like; to look as if; such as; appearance; image; portrait; image under a mapping (math.)
походить; быть как; выглядеть как будто; Такие как; внешний вид; изображение; портрет; изображение при отображении (математика)

像像RSa picture, image, figure, to resemble
  • picture resembling the image 象 of a man 亻
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 象 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.

图像 [ tú xiàng ]: image; picture; graphic
录像 [ lù xiàng ]: to videotape; to videorecord; video recording; Classifiers: 盘
影像 [ yǐng xiàng ]: image

CONTEXT_sherlock:
好像like
那个男人看了看赵亮，好像[10]不太相信[11]赵亮。The man looked at Zhao Liang, as if [10] didn't believe [11] Zhao Liang.
高明好像知道赵亮在想什么，马上问卷发男人:“谢先生，你 是茶馆[15]老板[16]吧？Gao Ming seemed to know what Zhao Liang was thinking, and immediately sent a questionnaire to the man: "Mr. Xie, you are the teahouse[15] owner[16], right?
这个时候，高明从椅子上起来，他在房间里走来走去，好像在想什么事。At this time, Gao Ming got up from the chair and walked around the room, as if thinking about something.
heisig_chinese_memo: The statue of liberty is being replaced by a statue of much likeness - Mr. T riding an elephant.
heisig_constituent: statue, person, elephant, colour, color, bound up, sow, pig
koohiiStory1: Statues of people are made the same size as statues of elephants.
koohiiStory2: One of the most famous statues is of course the Statue of Liberty, which is known for the first thing a person sees when coming into New York. However, did you know that the first thing a person used to see (between the years of 1885 to 1896) was actually a huge elephant statue on Coney Island? It's true too... ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coney_Island - search Coney Island Elephant).
jp_example_words:
映像(えいぞう): reflection, image
現像(げんぞう): developing (film)
像(ぞう): statue, image, figure, picture, portrait
仏像(ぶつぞう): Buddhist image (statue)
想像(そうぞう): imagination, guess
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader of the elephants was so great, they made a statue of him. This image of him looks down on all the other elephants at all times.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: For now, just imagine the leader of the elephants being told they're getting a statue. Don't think about what the statue looks like, because that's next.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When they unveil the statue of the leader elephant, everyone gasps. It's a statue of the leader, but they are a zombie (ぞう). Gasp!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: But this is exactly what the leader of the elephants asked for. For you see, the leader of the elephants was a big fan of zombies. Imagine the elephant leader being so excited to have a zombie version of the statue.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The statue of liberty is being replaced by a statue of much likeness - Mr. T riding an elephant.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " human ", from " xiang ", " xiang " also sounds, the original meaning is similar. "Shuowen": "Images. From people to images, images are also sound. Reading is like raising." "Huainanzi: Master Shu": "The world follows it, like the sound of a sound, and the image of a scene."

" Like " can mean simulation and imitation. "Yi‧XiCiXi": "Yao Ye, those who follow this example; those who are like this, also those who are like this." Kong Yingdashu: "The words are like the shape of this thing." Lu Deming's interpretation: "Imitation."

" Image " also means to follow and go smoothly. "Huainanzi-Lan Mingxun": "I live between the emperor, his father and his son, and compete with him, arrogant the master and be like his will, and chaos to make things happen." Gao You's note: "Like, still follow."

" Like " also means seeming, like. "Water Margin" Chapter 31: "Virtuous brother, let's stop fighting. When I look at him, this man looks like a hero."

" Image " also means portrait. "Songs of the Chu: Recalling the Soul": "Heaven and earth are everywhere, there are more thieves, like a monarch's room, quieter and more peaceful." Zhu Xi's notes: "Like, covering the Chu vulgar, the appearance of the death is placed in the room and the temple is also "Jiang Ji's note: "If people like today's portraits are inherently born for them, they don't have to refer specifically to the afterlife."
humanum_short_description_en: From " human ", from " xiang ", " xiang " also sounds, the original meaning is similar.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，從「象」，「象」亦聲，本義為相似。《說文》：「象也。从人从象，象亦聲。讀若養。」《淮南子‧主術》：「天下從之，如響之應聲，景之像形。」

　　「像」可表示模擬、仿效。《易‧繫辭下》：「爻也者，效此者也；像也者，像此者也。」孔穎達疏：「言象此物之形狀也。」陸德明釋文：「擬也。」

　　「像」也表示依隨、順遂。《淮南子‧覽冥訓》：「居君臣父子之間，而競載，驕主而像其意，亂人以成其事。」高誘注：「像，猶隨也。」

　　「像」還表示似乎、好像。《水滸傳》第31回：「賢弟，且休打，待我看他一看，這人也像是一箇好漢。」

　　「像」亦表示肖像。《楚辭‧招魂》：「天地四方，多賊姦些，像設君室，靜閒安些。」朱熹集注：「像，蓋楚俗，人死則設其形貌於室而祠之也。」蔣驥注：「若今人寫真之類，固有生而為之者，不必專指死後也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，從「象」，「象」亦聲，本義為相似。

從「 人 」，從「 象 」，「 象 」亦聲，本義為相似。《說文》：「象也。从人从象，象亦聲。讀若養。」《淮南子‧主術》：「天下從之，如響之應聲，景之像形。」 「 像 」可表示模擬、仿效。《易‧繫辭下》：「爻也者，效此者也；像也者，像此者也。」孔穎達疏：「言象此物之形狀也。」陸德明釋文：「擬也。」 「 像 」也表示依隨、順遂。《淮南子‧覽冥訓》：「居君臣父子之間，而競載，驕主而像其意，亂人以成其事。」高誘注：「像，猶隨也。」 「 像 」還表示似乎、好像。《水滸傳》第31回：「賢弟，且休打，待我看他一看，這人也像是一箇好漢。」 「 像 」亦表示肖像。《楚辭‧招魂》：「天地四方，多賊姦些，像設君室，靜閒安些。」朱熹集注：「像，蓋楚俗，人死則設其形貌於室而祠之也。」蔣驥注：「若今人寫真之類，固有生而為之者，不必專指死後也。」

"Huainanzi: Master Shu": "The world follows it, like the sound of a sound, and the image of a scene." " Like" can mean simulation and imitation. "Yi‧XiCiXi": "Yao Ye, those who follow this example; those who are like this, also those who are like this." Kong Yingdashu: "The words are like the shape of this thing." Lu Deming's interpretation: "Imitation." " Image" also means to follow and go smoothly. "Huainanzi-Lan Mingxun": "I live between the emperor, his father and his son, and compete with him, arrogant the master and be like his will, and chaos to make things happen." Gao You's note: "Like, still follow." " Like" also means seeming, like. "Water Margin" Chapter 31: "Virtuous brother, let's stop fighting. When I look at him, this man looks like a hero." " Image" also means portrait. "Songs of the Chu: Recalling the Soul": "Heaven and earth are everywhere, there are more thieves, like a monarch's room, quieter and more peaceful." 像字的基本解释

像
xiàng
相似：好像。相（xi乶g ）像。像生（ａ．仿天然产物制成的工艺品；ｂ．中国宋、元两代以说唱为业的女艺人）。
比照人物做成的图形：画像。塑像。雕像。绣像。肖像。
比如，比方：像这样的事是值得注意的。

像字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàng］
［《廣韻》徐兩切，上養，邪。］
(1)形象，形状。
(2)榜样；法式。
(3)模拟，仿效。
(4)相似，类似。
(5)依随，顺遂。
(6)似乎，好象。用于推测、判断。
(7)如同。用于比喻。
(8)犹言比如。用于列举。
(9)肖像。
(10)引申为立像，或比照人物形象绘画或雕塑图像。

像字的英文翻译

◎ 像
likeness, picture, image

像字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　像； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页116第08
【唐韻】徐兩切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】似兩切，?音象。形象也，肖似也。又摹倣也。【易·繫辭】象也者，像此者也。【荀子·議兵篇】像上之意。通作象。

像字的源字形

像字的起名意思

相貌，绘画、雕塑等的图形；相似，仿佛；比如，比方。

Like
xiàng
Similar: It seems. Phase (xi乶g) like. Xiangsheng (a. Handicrafts made of imitating natural products; b. Female artists of the Song and Yuan dynasties in China who used rap as their career).

Like
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàng］
["Guangyun" Xu two cuts, upper raising, evil. ]
(1) Image and shape.
(2) Role model; French style.
(3) Simulate, imitate.
(4) Similar, similar.
(5) Follow and go smoothly.
(6) It seems, as if. Used for speculation and judgment.
(7) As. Used as a metaphor.
(8) It's still like. Used for enumeration.
(9) Portrait.
(10) The extension is a standing image, or a painting or sculpture image based on a character image.

Нравиться
Зная слово.
Congren (), Congxiang (аналогичный), Xiang (xiang) также выражают звук, что означает цифру, полученную путем сравнения символов.
Первоначальный смысл - сравнивать фигуры, сделанные персонажами.
①По сравнению с фигурами персонажей: Сяо ~ "живопись ~" резьба ~. ②Аналогично: ~ он такой же "нарисованный на самом деле ~".
③Вроде: ОК ~ | ~ Пойдет дождь.
Будда ~ Запись ~ Марионетка ~ Люди ~ Бог ~ Камень ~ Настоящий ~
Пластик ~ Бронза ~ Голова ~ Картина ~ Грудь ~ Вышивка ~ Реликвия ~ Сделано ~

писец
Кай
xiàng
I сущ.
1) внешний облик, вид; форма; лицо, физиономия; образ, подобие; изображать; портрет
照一个像 снять портрет, сфотографировать
雕刻像 скульптурный портрет
铜像 бронзовая статуя
遗像 портрет (покойного)
2) икона; статуя божества
像经 изображения Будды и священные книги
3) пример, достойный подражания, образец, эталон
置以为像 поставить в качестве образца
II гл.
1) походить (быть похожим) на... (кого-л., что-л.) , иметь сходство с (кем-л., чем-л.) ; подобный, похожий, такой как (также служебное слово, см. ниже III)
他像父亲 он похож на отца
水晶像玻璃 хрусталь напоминает стекло
这不像你做的事 это на тебя не похоже
像他这样的人绝不可靠 люди, подобные ему, совершенно ненадёжны
2) подражать (кому-л., чему-л.) , копировать (кого-л., что-л.) , следовать (чему-л.), перенимать (что-л.)
像其意 следовать его идеям
III служебное слово
уподобляться; наподобие; как; вроде; как будто; словно, точно; служебный глагол-связка в начале конструкций уподобления, обычно замыкаемых корреспондирующими ему концовками 一样, 一般, 似的 или 是的 и состоящих из слова, словосочетания или предложения, напр.
我的心像水一样干净 моё сердце чисто, как вода
她提着, 笔像要写什么似的 она держала кисть (перо), как будто собиралась что-то написать
IV вводн. слово
как будто бы, по-видимому, кажется
像在这里见过他 в этих местах я, как будто бы, встречался с ним
刚才像是有一阵铃声 кажется, только что прозвенел звонок
Radicals: ｲ, 象  (leader, elephant)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader of the elephants was so great, they made a statue of him. This image of him looks down on all the other elephants at all times.
For now, just imagine the leader of the elephants being told they're getting a statue. Don't think about what the statue looks like, because that's next.
Reading Mnemonic
When they unveil the statue of the leader elephant, everyone gasps. It's a statue of the leader, but they are a zombie (ぞう). Gasp!
But this is exactly what the leader of the elephants asked for. For you see, the leader of the elephants was a big fan of zombies. Imagine the elephant leader being so excited to have a zombie version of the statue.

一 (один), 化 (превращаться), 勹 (обёртка), 口 (рот), 豕 (свинья)
Сравни: 僧 (ソウ монах), 象 (ショウ、ゾウ явление; слон)
像ぞう
  • статуя; изваяние;
  • портрет; изображение; образ; фигура
    • 想像そうぞう
  • воображение (напр. "напряги воображение" или "могу себе представить")
    • 画像
    がぞう
  • изображение (недвижимое, напр. на экране компьютера)
    • 影像えいぞう
  • проецируемое, отбрасываемое, динамическое изображение
  • тень, силуэт
    • 好像like
    那个男人看了看赵亮，好像[10]不太相信[11]赵亮。The man looked at Zhao Liang, as if [10] didn't believe [11] Zhao Liang.
    高明好像知道赵亮在想什么，马上问卷发男人:“谢先生，你 是茶馆[15]老板[16]吧？Gao Ming seemed to know what Zhao Liang was thinking, and immediately sent a questionnaire to the man: "Mr. Xie, you are the teahouse[15] owner[16], right?
    这个时候，高明从椅子上起来，他在房间里走来走去，好像在想什么事。At this time, Gao Ming got up from the chair and walked around the room, as if thinking about something.
